March 21, 1928 D Harrogate and District BBA Contest (Open)
Harrogate and District BBA Contest (Open) 0 Own Choice Test Piece Contest Harrogate and District BBA Contest harrogate-and-district-bba-contest-open
Test Piece Contest
Recollections of Verdi [arr. Rimmer]
Knaresborough, Yorkshire Hymn tune contest - 1st Ripon, 2nd Harrogate Borough, 3rd Easingwold. 7 bands competed.
Sept. 27, 2013, 8:16 a.m. July 14, 2016, 11:56 a.m.
1 Ripon City Band Harry W. Hill
2 Harrogate Borough H. Breedon
3 Thirsk and Sowerby James Moss
4 Harrogate Silver George Todd
Unknown Result Knaresborough Silver C. Creacey
Unknown Result Easingwold Town Band G. Fox
Unknown Result Wetherby and District Silver R. Littlewood
